name: Glen Echo Group

overview: Named by the National Journal as one of Washington, D.C.â€™s top women-owned firms, the Glen Echo Group is the go-to for clients looking for strategic, cutting-edge communications and issue advocacy that integrates public affairs, media relations, coalition building, event planning, and social media with creative and compelling tools that get the job done. Glen Echo Group represent clients across the New Economy, ranging from the Fortune 500 to the smallest of start-ups, always with the same philosophy: We listen. We think. We create. We win.
